text: The Vaquero's Vow is a 1908 American silent drama movie directed by D. W. GriffithThe Vaquero’s VowThe Vaquero’s Vow and stars Charles Inslee, Harry Solter, and Linda Arvidson. ==Actors== * Charles Inslee as Renaldo * Harry Solter as Gonzales * Linda Arvidson * Gladys Egan as Little Girl * Frank Evans * George Gebhardt as Wedding Party / Bartender * Arthur V. Johnson as Wedding Party / In Bar * Florence Lawrence as Wedding Party / In Bar * Wilfred Lucas * Jeanie MacPherson * Mack Sennett as Wedding Party / In Bar ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1908 drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: The Vaquero's Vow
